entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Outbox S.S.Cryptography.PbeParameters #113952
    10.0.0
  • Stack overflow from static constructors taking locks on Native AOT #113949
    10.0.0
  • Cannot consume TrustedCertificatesDirectory from netfx app #113947
  • [Text.Json] Error: NoMetadataForTypeProperties, SourceGenerationContext #113946
  • FileSystemWatcher reports incorrect sequence of events on MacOS #113945
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'FitsIn(tree->TypeGet(), value)' during 'Assertion prop' #113940
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong result with `ConditionalExtractAfterLastActiveElement` #113939
    10.0.0
  • [wasm coreclr] fix Illegal byte sequence errors #113928
    Future
  • Deserialization of a JsonNode with string value fails #113926
    Future
  • Trimming analyzer false negative for Type property #113922
    10.0.0
  • Stop considering COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS an immutable Event Mask #113921
  • Disabling `IlcScanReflection` noticeably decreases the app size #113919
  • HttpClient.GetFromJsonAsync<T> does not handle 204 returned by ASP.NET Core #113941
  • MetadataAggregator.GetGenerationHandle returns incorrect results for Guid heap handles #113910
  • runtime-diagnostics pipeline follow up work #113909
    10.0.0

Closed

  • APX: Assertion failed: `IsApxExtendedEvexInstruction(id->idIns())` #113870
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT][iOS] App Hangs/Freezes with Static Virtual Properties in Interfaces on .NET 9 #113423
    9.0.x
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'bbTrueEdge->getSourceBlock() == this' during Optimize Bools #113923
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg2)' during 'Generate code' #113337
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient does not automatically follow https to http redirects #108588
    Future
  • `double.Parse` on MacOS doesn't raise `FormatException` the same as Windows and Linux #113917
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ and Async context #113567
  • [mono?] Cannot run host tests due to xunit version mismatch #60550
    Future
  • APX: Assertion failed 'size == info.compCompHnd->getClassSize(typeHnd)' #113869
    10.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert causing app to crash #113874

PullRequests

Created

  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Change FrameIdentifiers to be contract literals #113953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Do not generate unconstructed EEType for arrays that have a template #113951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fix declared type of custom comparer for MaxBy and MinBy #113944
    area-System.Linq, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Increase `runtime-coreclr libraries-pgo` timeout #113942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix CoreclrTestWrapperLib to be robust against exited processes #113937
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • RangeCheck: Don't create invalid ranges #113935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify the JsonDocument and Utf8JsonReader handling of DateTime/Offset #113929
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make the eager-enumerator a sealed class #113927
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Running tests against 8.0 #113925
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust additional source under utilcode and vm to use minipal_log API. #113916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WinHTTP] Remove legacy (Win 8.1-) WinInet proxy handling #113915
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ML-KEM: MLKemOpenSsl #113908
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • [APX] Make sure BMI instructions get correct displacement size. #113903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: layout compatibility vs assignability #113938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix fgDebugCheckTypes assert + small clean up #113920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't compact away block in cond-to-return folding #113931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assertions related to combining `cmn (extended-register)` (#113337) #113376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for comparisons against 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove most usages of the macro-based "don't return in this block" hack #113856
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactoring in AssertrionDesc #113440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SuperPMI collection helix queues #113884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • arm64: Add tests for return cases into optimise bools #113914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build Mono .frameworks by default on iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #113918
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Do not substitute return values of constrained calls #113462
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113418
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • Remove ConfigureAwait(false) from AsyncEnumerable LINQ #113911
    area-System.Linq
  • Build Mono's Framework libs in unified builds #113897
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Bring up runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move assembler code from virtualcallstubcpu.hpp to asmhelpers.asm #113828
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Templatize the two SuperPMI collection specifications #113886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix AltJit and VectorT ISA specification #113901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable `this` variable deoptimization on x86/funclets #113882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ThrowControlForThread on x86 funclet platforms #113872
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Two superpmi.py tweaks #113890
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [APX] Make sure KMOV is not encoded in EVEX when JitStressEvexEncoding is set. #113854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers Part 2 : Make operations on fixedRegs less expensive #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Parallel change to the diagnostic update for GC Info decoder. #113888
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Fix targets for using the NativeAOT runtime pack as the "target ILC" pack #113902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deduplicate base interfaces from another assembly in COM generator #111931
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reset ZLibStreamHandle when parsing concatenated GZip streams #113587
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113649
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • MLDsa initial OpenSSL based implementation #113764
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Graph-based loop inversion #113709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Support Activity Events and Links trace out of proc output #113905
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Binary writer fix #107369
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Missing memory barrier leads to crash in multi-threaded scenarios #113740
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.5
  • [browser] EventPipe - CPU sampling - single thread #113758
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [APX] Revert some unexpected code removal. #113898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add some basic tests for SLH-DSA #113766
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension #113678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [SGen/Tarjan] Handle edge case with node heaviness changing due to deduplication #113044
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • CI tests #113571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
